snippet.title: Citadel 1.3 Remonstered performance on Amiga 1200
snippet.description:
This is the latest Citadel 1.3 "Remonstered" version running on a real, unaccelerated Commodore Amiga 1200 with Fast memory. 

This version is prepared as a WHDLoad Install based on the original English version of the game and will shortly be available on the offcial WHDLoad site (link to follow soon). It can be run on any Amiga, real or emulated, meeting minimum WHDLoad requirements and with a free 1MB of Fast memory.

It is also included in THE A500 Mini bonus USB games pack and runs great on the Mini!
https://retrogames.biz/games/amiga/citadel/
The bonus pack can be downloaded from here:
https://retrogames.biz/support/thea500-mini/bonus-games/

The gameplay capture quality in this video is not that great, as it's done off an Amiga monitor, but we wanted to show proof that it runs smoothly on real, unaccelerated HW.

You can switch on the FPS display by pressing the ' (quote) key, the top number is FPS and the bottom one is the same data but presented as PAL frames between screen redraws.

Highlights:
- Significantly improved performance (4-6x depending on the CPU)
- Significantly updated in-game graphics
- Redesigned levels
- Rebalanced gameplay
- Extended backstory
- Modern WASD + mouse control
- Crosshairs  
- ... and many more, see the README file and the new manual included in the release .

... More related videos:
A500 performance:
https://youtu.be/e-cNskzcE0E
A3000 performance:
https://youtu.be/6Q9w67AuJps
